main.name: Razi Murshed
main.description: Welcome to my personal website! I am a software engineer based in Toronto, Canada
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer based in Canada specializing in large scale software system design, web application development, telecommunications, computer security and software architecture. Over the past 5 years, I have worked in various capacities developing software for both industry and academia. I am currently a Software Development Engineer at Amazon and have been affiliated with various other organizations in the past. Recently, I have been taking an active interest in learning Front End technolgies. Besides work, I love to watch and play sports such as Soccer, Cricket and Badminton. I play the keyboards and like to experiment with music creation software. Additionally, I love to travel and am always looking for suggestions on cool places to go!

resume.skillmessage: Here are my software engineering skills and my self assesed proficiency at each one of them.

education.description: I was an Honours Electrical engineering student at McGill University in Montreal, Canada where I conducted research in the Advanced Networking Research Laboratory. My program also included multiple coop terms. While at McGill, I also worked on several hardware and software projects of which notable ones include a search and rescue robot, FM Radio and an honours thesis profiling the linux network stack.

work.title: Software Development Engineer 2
description: Carrying out full stack software development for Amazon's Customer Engagement Technologies division.
Developing features, driving deprecations and migrations for Amazon's customer contact management systems.
As Scrum master running sprint planning and retro meetings, carrying out backlog refinement and implementing best scrum practices.
Developing frontend software systems using React, Redux and Perl Mason.
Developing Backend infrastructure and services using Native AWS and Java/Python.
Mentoring interns and new graduates to hire and develop the best.

work.title: Software Engineer 2
description: Delivering software components that drives Ciena's Data Center Interconnect solution, the Waveserver Platform.
Tailored solutions to needs of customers such as Google, Amazon, Facebook and Comcast.
Notable projects include MongoDB based Database Manager, Alarm Management Subsystem, License Manager, Flight Recorder system and Encryption Engine.
Developed software using C/C++ for a RHEL platform.

work.title: Software Engineer Coop
description: Developed a performance benchmarking tools for the windows display wall team.
Created a performance testing framework using Visual Studio and C++ for matrox graphics cards.
Used framework to run benchmarking tests for cards running on various DirectX  and OpenGL APIs.
Identified and analyzed possible sources of latency and suggested possible improvements.

work.title: Software Developer Coop
description: Developed software for the Authentication Federation Gateway team using Agile scrum and kanban.
Used C++ and Java to write source code for product and Java to develop internal test framework.
Used JavaScript and Perl for frontend business logic development.
Used docker and VMWare to set up test deployments for integration testing
